Metadata: S.E.A. Lab Monterey Bay: an ocean of knowledge

This video promotes S.E.A. Lab, a coastal and ocean science education camp for elementary and secondary school students modeled after the highly successful Space Camp. The program, scheduled to open to the public in 2002, makes use of the unique human and natural resources of the Monterey Bay (California) region to provide a high-quality and fun learning experience. S.E.A. Lab will also serve as a laboratory for student teaching, in-service training, and curriculum development and delivery.
